issue.title: Cannot move/rotate model when it's in motion

content.raw: I think receiving some old poses before the new ones is ok, it's going to create a `blink` effect which is not ideal but the same thing happens in gazebo.  In any case, it's better than not being able to move the model at all. Thanks for looking into this.
content.html: I think receiving some old poses before the new ones is ok, it's going to create a blink effect which is not ideal but the same thing happens in gazebo. In any case, it's better than not being able to move the model at all. Thanks for looking into this.
